

## About the GEO transcriptomics data quality explorer
### Dataset information

This Shiny App is for generating ROC curves to test the quality of a list of selected NCBI GEO datasets, retrieved from [NCBI GEO (Gene Expression Omnibus)](http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/)

![][logo1]  ![][logo_geo]

### NOTE

R functions for retriving the GEO datasets are not provided in this Shiny application
